long_description: Offering 2-finger bar ends, broad palm platforms and antislip grip inserts, the Ergon GP2 Bike Grips balance performance and comfort for mountain biking, touring or commuting,. Grips feature 2-finger bar ends for a lightweight, low-profile option that offers added hand positioning and leverage for out-of-the-saddle cranking. Palm platform and bar end are independently adjustable to optimize support. Ergon GP2 Bike Grips feature integrated antislip rubber inserts for excellent grip in all conditions. Note: These grips are not suitable for use with carbon handlebars.
